title: Nathalie Granger
description: With little or no embellishment, film-maker Marguerite Duras offers a simple, often wordless chronicle of a woman's day. She and her friend are seen doing yard work, talking about their families and receiving the occasional visitor. The brightest spot in the day is when a washing machine salesman comes to call.  Credits: Producer, Luc Moullet ; director, Marguerite Duras ; writer, Marguerite Duras ; photography, Ghislain Cloquet ; music, Marguerite Duras ; editor, Nicole Lubtchansky ; other crew, Benoit Jacquot, Bruno Nuytten, Michel Vionnet. Cast: Jeanne Moreau, Lucia Bose, Gerard Depardieu, Valerie Mascolo, Dionys Mascolo, Luce Garcia-Ville.
